concept.title: Workflow Designer
concept.shortdesc: The Workflow Designer is a module within the Designer Studio (DS) Workbench application that lets you construct workflows to automate business processes without writing any code at all. This designer is a graphical modelling tool that assists you with creating diagrams using flow objects to describe the flow of activities in the Triple'A Plus application. The following concepts, tasks, and reference sections will help you understand and effectively use the Workflow Designer.
